component-metadata.description: Computes and export a Gaussian Mixture Modele (Bayesian clustering method)

out-ports.port: Table of probabilities for each row to be in each class. An additionnal colum give the max value of these probabilities to see if some rows are outliers.

Table giving the class associated to each row of the input data. Also probabilities for each row to be in each class. An additionnal colum "max_value" give the max value of these probabilities to see if some rows are outliers.
